ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include multiple pull requests to improve the osu!taiko mode, such as reworking rhythm difficulty to be based on complex interval ratios, introducing a new method to evaluate consistency penalties, and fixing leniency issues with the OsuModRelax mod. These changes aim to enhance the overall gameplay experience and are available for testing.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities involve expanding system mod articles and fixing issues with Touch Device incompatible mods. A push event and a pull request were made to update and merge changes into the system-mods branch, improving the overall documentation and information available on the osu! wiki.
